# NullableValueTypeArgument_With_DefaultValue

## HotChocolateTypeModule.735550c.g.cs

```csharp
// <auto-generated/>

#nullable enable
#pragma warning disable

using System;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using HotChocolate;
using HotChocolate.Types;
using HotChocolate.Execution.Configuration;

namespace Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection
{
    public static partial class TestsTypesRequestExecutorBuilderExtensions
    {
        public static IRequestExecutorBuilder AddTestsTypes(this IRequestExecutorBuilder builder)
        {
            builder.ConfigureDescriptorContext(ctx => ctx.TypeConfiguration.TryAdd(
                "Tests::TestNamespace.Query",
                global::HotChocolate.Types.OperationTypeNames.Query,
                () => global::TestNamespace.Query.Initialize));
            builder.ConfigureSchema(
                b => b.TryAddRootType(
                    () => new global::HotChocolate.Types.ObjectType(
                        d => d.Name(global::HotChocolate.Types.OperationTypeNames.Query)),
                    HotChocolate.Language.OperationType.Query));
            return builder;
        }
    }
}
```

```csharp
        static partial void Configure(global::HotChocolate.Types.IObjectTypeDescriptor descriptor);

        private sealed class __Resolvers
        {
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetBooleanExplicitValue_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetBooleanExplicitNull_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetBooleanExplicitDefault_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetLongExplicitValue_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetLongExplicitValueWithSuffix_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetLongExplicitNull_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetLongExplicitDefault_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetCharExplicitValue_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetCharExplicitNull_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetCharExplicitDefault_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetEnumExplicitValue_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetEnumExplicitNull_bar;
            private readonly global::HotChocolate.Internal.IParameterBinding _binding_GetEnumExplicitDefault_bar;

            public __Resolvers(global::HotChocolate.Resolvers.ParameterBindingResolver bindingResolver)
            {
                _binding_GetBooleanExplicitValue_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetBooleanExplicitValue_bar());
                _binding_GetBooleanExplicitNull_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetBooleanExplicitNull_bar());
                _binding_GetBooleanExplicitDefault_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetBooleanExplicitDefault_bar());
                _binding_GetLongExplicitValue_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetLongExplicitValue_bar());
                _binding_GetLongExplicitValueWithSuffix_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetLongExplicitValueWithSuffix_bar());
                _binding_GetLongExplicitNull_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetLongExplicitNull_bar());
                _binding_GetLongExplicitDefault_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetLongExplicitDefault_bar());
                _binding_GetCharExplicitValue_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetCharExplicitValue_bar());
                _binding_GetCharExplicitNull_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetCharExplicitNull_bar());
                _binding_GetCharExplicitDefault_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetCharExplicitDefault_bar());
                _binding_GetEnumExplicitValue_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetEnumExplicitValue_bar());
                _binding_GetEnumExplicitNull_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetEnumExplicitNull_bar());
                _binding_GetEnumExplicitDefault_bar = bindingResolver.GetBinding(CreateParameterDescriptor_GetEnumExplicitDefault_bar());
            }

            public global::HotChocolate.Internal.ParameterDescriptor CreateParameterDescriptor_GetBooleanExplicitValue_bar()
                => new HotChocolate.Internal.ParameterDescriptor(
                    "bar",
                    typeof(bool?),
```
